resources.string:
"aali -- excellent __ 
" "abadani -- never __ kijana huyu hanywi pombe abadani.
" "abiria aliyeketi ubavuni pangu -- the passenger sitting at my side
" "abiria -- passenger
" "-abiri -- learn from experience __ kutokana na kifo cha wazee wake, ameabiri kwamba maisha ni magumu.
" "-abiri -- predict, foresee __ aliabiri kwamba mvua itanyesha leo.
" "-abiri -- travel, navigate, sail __ aliabiri kwenye mashua.
" "-abudu -- worship, idolize; heshimu, ogopa omba, nyenyekea, tumikia __ mila na itikadi pamoja na hayo imani ya kuabudu mizimu.
" "abwe! -- wow! (expl) __ 
" "-acha -- abandon, neglect __ kuku aliwaacha watoto wake.
" "-acha -- allow, permit, let sby do sth; ruhusu mtu afanye jambo __ wacha nitumie hadi jumatatu. alimwacha mtoto wake afanye atakavyo.
" "-acha -- avoid, cease, stop doing sth __ acha kucheza kamari.
" "-acha -- divorce, separation; tengana na mtu, kitu, jambo au hali __ amemwacha mkewe. kuku amewaacha watoto wake.
" "-acha -- give instructions, leave a message to sby while away; toa masharti au maagizo ya kutekelezwa na mtu mwingine wakati umeondoka __ aliacha maagizo kwa jirani zake.
" "-acha -- leave sth behind; bakiza kitu, mtu, mali __ aliacha mali nyingi aliipokufa. amekiacha chakula nusu sahani. nilimwacha fulani posta.
" "-achama -- gape, stare, gawk __ mbona unaachama?
" "-acha mavanga -- acha udanganyifu au uongo (idm) __ 
" "-acha mkono -- die (idiom) __ alituacha mkono zamani.
" "-achana -- be separated __ kuachana naye
" "-achana nasi -- depart/leave us; die __ 
" "acha! -- neno la kuonyesha mshangao na furaha __ acha wee!
" "-acha -- pardon, release, let go __ nilimkamata mwizi wa mifuko na kisha nikamwachilia.
" "-acha -- pass by sth [directions]; pita kitu fulani __ acha nyumba ili mkono wa kushoto kisha uende moja kwa mjoa mpaka kwa hilo jengo. acha hoteli mkono wa kulia uende kama mitamia hivi.
" "-acha -- resign from sth; kutoendelea kujihusisha na kitu, shughuli, shirika fulani __ ameacha kazi.
" "achari -- pickles __ 
" "-achia -- leave to sby __ aliniachia simu yake nimsajili katika mtandao wa duo.
" "-achilia -- acquit, discharge __ mahakama ilimwachilia huru mshtakiwa.
" "-achisha -- stop sby from doing sth __ achisha ziwa [wean a child]. achisha kazi [fire terminate sby employment].
" "adabu -- respect, good manners __ 
" "ada -- custom, tradition; habit __ ada za harusi. ana ada ya kuchelewa kazini kila siku. ada ya mja hunena, muungwana ni kitendo
" "~a daima -- lasting __ upendo wa daima; asipojua kusema daima hataelewana na wenzake.
" "adapta -- adapter (tech)
" "ada ya pango -- rent __ analipa shilingi ngapi ada ya pango?
" "ada ya pango -- rent (n)
" "ada ya uhamisho -- transfer fee __ 
" "~a dayo -- dial-up (adj) (tech)
" "adhabu -- punishment, penalty; persecution __ mwanafunzi atapata adhabu kali. kibarua cha kuchuma majani chai ni adhabu.
" "adha -- inconvenience, nuisance, annoyance __ mbona hakunizaa katika ulimwengu usiokuwa na adha na ubaya?
" "~a dhati -- genuine, true __ mapenzi ya dhati kwa sana
" "-adhibiwa -- be punished __ ni haki mtu kuadhibiwa kwa jambo ambalo hakufanya?
" "-adhibu -- punish, harass __ serikali itawaadhibu wale wanavunja sheria. akiniadhibu basi mimi nitaripoti kwa wazee wake.
" "-adhimisha -- commemorate, celebrate, glorify, honor; sherekea jambo au siku kwa kuitukuza, ipa heshima __ nchi yetu iliadhimisha miaka thelathini ya kkupatikana kwa uhuru.
" "adhimisho (ma) -- commemoration, celebration, observance __ 
" "adhimu -- bountiful, much __ alikuwa na mali adhimu
" "adhimu -- exalted, glory, prestigious, honorable __ kulikuwa na sherehe adhimu mtaani hivi karibuni.
" "-adhiri, -aziri -- disgrace, slander __ aliniaziri kwa kunidai pesa zake hadharani (in public).
" "adhuhuri -- noontime __ habari za adhuhuri?
" "-adibu -- teach good manners; fundisha mwenendo mwema au tabia njema; kuwa adabu __ mzee alimwadibu binti yake jinsi ya kuwashughulikia wageni.
" "~adilifu -- just and good; righteous __ kiongozi mwadilifu. daktari Nozi alikuwa kijana mwadilifu.
" "adilifu -- just and good; righteousness __ yote yalikuwa chini ya usimamizi mzuri na adilifu wa dada yake
" "-adili -- judge impartially; be impartial, be just __ mkuu wa wilaya anasifika sana katika kuadili shughuli mbalimbali za wilaya.
"
